content: 6.8/11 DX 9 HSN M40 Powder cartridges Collated .27 caliber cartridges for use with stand-up powder-actuated nailers for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Delivers the most reliable fastenings and highest productivity when used with Hilti DX nailers Designed specifically for use with Hilti powder-actuated tools as part of a matched tolerance system Applications Powder-actuated fastening of profile metal decks to steel structures for roofing and flooring applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): DX 860-HSN, DX 9-HSN Cartridge type: .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M40 Approvals: CE, CIP, PTB Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX 860-HSN, DX 9-HSN | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M40 | Approvals | CE, CIP, PTB | Cartridge strip capacity | 40 | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2208111 - DX Cartridge 6.8/11 M40 X10 B black - Package Size 1000 pc
